siteTitle: Abhishek Sharma - Full-Stack Developer & Gen AI Engineer
siteDescription: Portfolio of Abhishek Sharma, a full-stack developer and Gen AI engineer with 4 years of experience specializing in serverless RAG pipelines, Next.js, Python, and AWS cloud technologies. Expert in building scalable AI-powered applications.
